SMTP Pro Email General Settings: If you are experiencing problems with this extension please run the self diagnosing test by clicking the button below. The module will log what it is doing if you enable logging, this can be useful to determine problems aswell. 邮件配置: 配置过程遇到问题请联系我们<a href='http://aschroder.com' target='_blank'>ASchroder.com</a>.

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: This will determine which configuration is used; Gmail/Google Apps, SMTP or the new experimental Amazon SES.
邮件配置: 目前支持SMTP,Google Apps/Gmail 和 AmazonSES.

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: This will determine if the extension uses the simple Google Apps/Gmail configuration, The advanced SMTP configuration or disables the extension completely.
邮件配置: 目前支持SMTP,Google Apps/Gmail 和 AmazonSES.

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: Use Store Email Addresses for Reply-to
邮件配置: 使用联系人邮箱作为回件人地址

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: These options can be used during development and testing to control the destination of all emails, or to stop Magento emails sending. (Note: if extensions do not send emails 'the magento way' then they will not be supressed)
邮件配置: 将会禁止所有邮件的对外发送

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: This will log all outbound emails to the table smtppro_email_log and allow viewing within the admin interface from System->Tools->Email Log.
邮件配置: 对外发送的所有邮件都会被记录下来

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: This test will ensure the configuration in your Google Apps/ Gmail OR SMTP section are working. You have to save the settings from either of these sections before running this test.
邮件配置: 自检支持各种发送模式

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: SMTP Pro Email Google Apps/Gmail Settings
This will determine if and how you authenticate with your SMTP server. If you choose no authentication then the username and password below are not used.
邮件配置: 如果邮件账号不需要密码不需要填写下面的信息

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: If you use Authentication for your SMTP server this is the username used to authenticate.
If you use Authentication for your SMTP server this is the password used to authenticate.
This is the SMTP server hostname you would like to send your emails through. This is required.
This is the port on the SMTP server you connect to. The value is optional, it defaults to 25 for none and TLS or 465 for SSL.
This will determine if any SSL security should be used to connect to your SMTP server.
SMTP server you connect to. The value is optional, it defaults to 25 for none and TLS or 465 for SSL.

SMTP Pro Email General Settings: SMTP Pro Email Amazon SES Settings (experimental)
These settings are for experimental use of the Amazon AWS SES service. This should not be used on a production server yet, but please do try it out and let me know how you get on.
邮件配置: 亚马逊的邮件发送服务目前还在测试阶段,不够稳定,请使用时候注意.
